name: Cooking Rush - Food Games
description:
" Cooking Rush" is the latest restaurant cooking game of 2019, which is far more exciting than other cooking games because of its smooth operation and delicate picture.
There are hundreds of levels of free games, from burger hot dogs to barbecue, from dessert cakes to seafood. Each restaurant has a new food mix that allows you to learn about food around the world without leaving home!
In the game, you need to quickly make food according to customer needs, get customers' praise, earn more coins, upgrade tableware, improve food, unlock more restaurants... Come and start your restaurant tour NOW!

Game features:
- Combo of serving dishes can get extra rewards.
- Upgrade kitchen utensils and ingredients, faster output, higher profits.
- Rich props help you complete your level goals more easily.
- Anytime, anywhere, no need to connect to the Internet! Fragment time can also enjoy fun!
